page.title: 03ATTITUDES IN FORFAR
page.content: {Sport}Every year there is a Rosebowl competition in netball for the four Primary Schools in Forfar to take part. This year Chapelpark school won the Rosebowl. At the Lowson Church the Girls and Boys Brigade is held.At the Reid Park Road we have our own tennis courts where learners and members go to practise for competitions. {Hobbies}On East High Street there is a Red Cross Office.The Red Cross is on a Tuesday and Friday night.You do bandaging and mother care unit, sometimes there are exams.There is a Library on West High Street and upstairs there is a museum and a dance hall.There are lots of sports including gymnastics at the Leisure Centre every day of the week.
